original_text: The noise of the trumpet became louder and louder. Moses spoke to God and God answered him with a loud voice.
korean_text: 나팔 소리가 점점 커질 때에 모세가 말한즉 하나님이 음성으로 대답하시더라

sentences.original_text: The noise of the trumpet became louder and louder.
and God answered him with a loud voice.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 하나님이 큰 음성으로 그에게 응답하셨습니다.
